forum.platformDescription: The Foresight forum is the core community for prediction market participants to share insights and strategies. You can create topics to discuss real-world events or join deep analysis of existing predictions.

sidebar.summaryBody: This is where real-time conversations, event breakdowns and strategy discussions around prediction markets happen, helping you get fresh community perspectives before and after you place trades.

criteria.priceReach: Based on authoritative price data sources, reaching or exceeding the target before the deadline counts as success
criteria.willWin: Based on official event results, winning the title before the deadline counts as success
criteria.willHappen: Based on official announcements or reputable media reports, the event happening before the deadline counts as success
criteria.default: Based on objective verifiable sources, meeting the condition before the deadline counts as success

meta.title: Foresight Proposals Square - Create new prediction markets and governance votes
meta.description: On the Foresight Proposals Square you can submit new prediction market ideas and governance topics for crypto, macro, AI and more, then let the community discuss and vote before they turn into live on-chain markets.

meta.twitterDescription: Launch or join proposal discussions and help the community design new prediction markets and governance processes.

onboarding.title: Share your little prediction universe
onboarding.subtitle: This is a cozy corner for honest thoughts, gentle debates and kind curiosity.

step1.title: Start with a simple hello
step1.desc: A "Hi, I‚Äôm here!" is more than enough. Human, messy, honest messages are very welcome.

step2.title: Tell us what you‚Äôre sensing
step2.desc: Share data, headlines or just a gut feeling. Imperfect takes are part of the fun.

step3.title: Co-create the bigger picture
step3.desc: Your little piece of insight plus everyone else‚Äôs perspectives makes the market much smarter.

onboarding.footer: It‚Äôs okay to take your time. The world is loud; here we‚Äôre here to listen first.

orderFlow.marketNotLoaded: Market data is still on its way. Try again in a moment.
orderFlow.walletRequired: Connect your wallet first so we can write this idea into the market.
orderFlow.walletNotReady: Your wallet is still waking up. Give it a second and try again.
orderFlow.invalidAmount: This amount looks a bit off. Double-check your input.
orderFlow.invalidAmountPrecision: The amount is a bit too precise. Up to 6 decimals are supported.
orderFlow.invalidPrice: Price must be between 0 and 1. Try nudging it into that range.
orderFlow.switchNetwork: Please switch to the correct network (Chain ID: {chainId}) and we‚Äôll continue.
orderFlow.fetchPlanFailed: We couldn‚Äôt fetch a trade plan right now. A quick refresh later might help.
orderFlow.insufficientLiquidity: There aren‚Äôt enough matching orders yet to complete this trade.
orderFlow.noFillableOrders: No existing orders currently line up with this one.
orderFlow.relayerNotConfigured: The matching helper isn‚Äôt ready yet, so market orders can‚Äôt run for now.
orderFlow.matchingInProgress: Matching your trade‚Ä¶ (batch {count}). Hang on a moment.
orderFlow.partialFilled: Only part of your order filled. The rest didn‚Äôt find a match yet.
orderFlow.approving: Asking the contract for permission on your behalf‚Ä¶
orderFlow.outcomeTokenApproving: Opening permission to use your outcome tokens for this market‚Ä¶
orderFlow.approveThenPlace: Approval looks good. Continuing with the order now.
orderFlow.orderFailedFallback: This order didn‚Äôt go through. It‚Äôs okay to try again later.
orderFlow.tradeFailed: This trade ran into an issue. We can adjust a bit and try again.
orderFlow.insufficientFunds: Not enough balance to complete this transaction.
orderFlow.rpcTimeout: Network is a bit unstable right now. Try again in a moment.
orderFlow.sellNoBalance: Sell failed: not enough outcome tokens right now. You can mint some below first, then try again.
orderFlow.sellMaybeNoMint: If you haven‚Äôt minted yet, you may not have tokens to sell. Mint a bit below and try once more.
orderFlow.cancelFailed: The order wasn‚Äôt canceled this time. You can try again in a bit.
orderFlow.slippageTooHigh: The estimated slippage for this market order is above your limit. Try reducing the size or allowing a higher slippage threshold and place it again.
orderFlow.marketConfirm:
You‚Äôre about to place a market {side} order.

Summary:
- Est. filled amount: {filled} / {total} shares
- Est. avg execution price: {avgPrice} USDC
- Est. worst execution price: {worstPrice} USDC
- Est. total cost: {totalCost} USDC
- Est. slippage: {slippage}%

Continue?

mintFlow.estimateFailed: Mint gas estimation failed, please check balance or permissions: {reason}

redeemFlow.marketNotResolved: The market hasn‚Äôt been resolved yet, so it can‚Äôt be redeemed.
redeemFlow.success: Redeem successful! USDC has been returned.

about.title: About this market
about.feeBody: On Foresight, day-to-day trading carries little to no extra fees. Only when a market is resolved and you redeem winning positions do we charge a 2% fee on the redeemed amount, which is used for the protocol and market-making incentives, with no hidden or additional charges.

discipline.title: See an issue? File a flag
discipline.body: If you think this market has incorrect information, unclear rules, manipulation, or anything that needs the arbitrator‚Äôs attention, file a flag and include supporting links.
discipline.hint: Flags go through the forum review flow and may be escalated to the arbitrator.
discipline.defaultDesc:
I think this market may have the following issue(s):

(Please add your reasoning and supporting links.)

comments.loadPreviewFailed: Failed to load discussion preview, please try again later
comments.migratedToForum: Discussions have been moved to the dedicated chat room in the forum
comments.migrationReason: To keep all opinions, strategies and reviews in one place, inline discussions are no longer provided here. You can continue the conversation in the Foresight forum chat room for this event.
comments.noDiscussion: No discussions yet. Be the first to start a topic in the forum!
comments.forumDescription: The Foresight forum is the core community for prediction market participants to share insights and strategies. You can create topics to discuss real-world events or join deep analysis of existing predictions.
comments.chatHint: In the forum you can view full message history, topic lists and related prediction markets. It‚Äôs also a good place to review your trades with others.
comments.orCreateNew: to discover events to discuss, or

outcomes.realTimeUpdate: Updated in real-time based on market prices

detail.priceHint: Price represents the implied probability of the event. You can buy or sell positions at any time and quickly adjust when your view changes.
detail.proposalOriginHint: This prediction market originates from community discussions in the Proposals Square. You can go back to the original proposal to continue exchanging ideas and iteration suggestions.
detail.defaultDescription: On-chain prediction market event. Trade your views on a decentralized blockchain-based prediction market platform.

searchPage.metaTitle: Foresight Global Search - Discover Prediction Markets & Proposals
searchPage.metaDescription: Quickly discover trending prediction markets, community proposals and discussions through Foresight global search. Connect events, governance and strategy research with keywords.
searchPage.jsonLdDescription: Foresight global search results page, aggregating on-chain prediction markets, proposal square and discussion content to help you quickly find related events and topics.
searchPage.heading: Global Search
searchPage.body: You can use the search box in the top right corner (‚åòK) to quickly search prediction markets, proposals and discussion content. This page is for external links and SEO descriptions. When you trigger search from the navigation bar, the global search panel will open.
searchPage.queryHint: The current URL contains query parameter q={query}. You can enter in the top search box again for real-time results.

rules.title: Rules & Rewards
rules.light: Light (1-7 days): needs roughly 70% of days approved to succeed, with a solid chance to drop a sticker at settlement.
rules.standard: Standard (8-14 days): usually requires at least 5 approved days and around a 75% completion ratio.
rules.intense: Intense (15-30 days): expects at least 10 approved days and a strong overall completion ratio, with higher drop chances when you succeed.
rules.hardcore: Hardcore (>30 days): tuned for higher completion ratios (around 85%) and more days, with better odds of high-rarity stickers.
rules.settleRuleHint: The system automatically adjusts the required days and completion ratio based on how long your Flag runs, so longer challenges have stricter but clearer success criteria.
rules.rewardHint: Both check-ins and final settlement can drop stickers; longer and better-completed challenges enjoy noticeably higher drop rates and rarities.

settleModal.title: Settle Challenge
settleModal.subtitle: Review your journey and claim rewards
settleModal.warning: You cannot check in after settlement. Rewards will be calculated based on your progress.

intro.witness: Carefully review each check-in. Your judgment directly decides whether this challenge is regarded as completed.
intro.default: Look back on every step and see how your persistence adds up.

successCondition.default: The system adjusts success conditions based on how long the challenge runs: shorter Flags generally require a solid majority of approved days, while longer ones expect more approved days and a higher completion ratio.
successCondition.dynamic: Succeed with at least {minDays} approved days and ‚â•{threshold}% completion.

onboarding.intro: In this {category}prediction market, you can trade your views on event outcomes by buying different options. The price represents the market consensus on the event's probability.
onboarding.tradingTip: The trading panel is on the right (desktop) or accessible via the bottom button (mobile). Charts and order book data help you observe market sentiment and price changes.
